turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Okay Google, I'd like to order some pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Where do you want to order from?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Domino's, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Domino's it is. Will you be ordering for pick-up or delivery?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Pick-up, please.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. How many pizzas would you like to order?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like two large pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, on the first pizza do you want thin crust, regular crust, or Brooklyn style.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Regular crust. Same for the second one as well.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. What sauce would you like on the first pizza? Marinara, garlic sauce, or barbecue sauce?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I want marinara on both pizzas.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. What toppings would you like on the first pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: I'd like chicken, black olives, pineapple, and tomatoes. And does Domino's have artichoke hearts by chance

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Sorry, Domino's does not have artichoke hearts.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: That's fine. Just chicken, olives, pineapple and tomatoes then.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: What would you like on the second pizza?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Make the second a pepperoni, sausage, and olives.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Got it. Please provide a name and phone number for the order.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: John Doe at 999-9999

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Thanks. Which location would you like to pick them up at?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: The one on 104th Ave.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Great. So to confirm your order, you want two large pizzas, both regular crust with marinara sauce. You want chicken, black olives, pineapple, and tomatoes on the first, and pepperoni, sausage, and black olives on the second, and you want to pick them up at the Domino's location on 104th Ave. Does that all sound right?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Yes, place the order.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: I have placed an order for your two large pizzas. They will be available for pick-up in about 25 minutes at the Domino's on 104th Ave. Where would you like your receipt sent?

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Send me a text.

turns.speaker: cashier
turns.text: Okay, your receipt has been sent to your mobile device.

turns.speaker: client
turns.text: Thanks Google.
